title: Top 3 Threat Report Insights for Q2 2024
description: Cato CTRL (Cyber Threats Research Lab) has released its Q2 2024 Cato CTRL SASE Threat Report. The report highlights critical findings based on the analysis of a staggering 1.38 trillion network flows from more than 2,500 of Catoâ€™s global customers, between April and June 2024.
